name: Lusamine Prism Star
effect:
You can play this card only if your opponent has exactly 3 Prize cards remaining.
Prevent all damage done to your Ultra Beasts by attacks during your opponent’s next turn.
author: nagimiso
rule_box: You can’t have more than 1 Prism Star card with the same name in your deck. If a Prism Star card would go to the discard pile, put it in the Lost Zone instead.
